TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Macau, title = Macau, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macau} }

S.FORM: = Macau = Gaga kska Yacow ka Macau, 22 10 N, 113 33 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 28.2 sq km(hangan na o Tg237) (knlbanga dxgal o 28.2 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 597,425 hiyi. jiyax 20 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Macau ga wada sugan 0% ka dxgal qpahan, 0% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 100% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Fernando Chui Sai On, pnaah hngkawas2009 idas 12 jiyax 20pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Macau = Macau, splawa Aw, cbiyaw u splawa Hawcingaw, splawa Hawcyang, Rongyamn, Haycing, Macyaw, Sutapu, kiya ka Cyoka jnmin konghekwo ddha tukubeycu singcngcyu uri, wa mniq tudaya mkngahu ucilung Nahay, kiya mi siyaw tuiwil Cucyangko, lmutuc Cuhaysu Kwangtong sng ka tudaya, tunarc pa msdalih Hong Kong 63 km, tuhunac mi tuiwil u lmutuc Nanhay. Macau u kiya ka pnspuwan Awmn pantaw, Tangcay, Rutang mi Ruhwan s4 nniqan, babaw kngkawas 2000 daw iyax Tangcay mi Ruhwan u hriyan dxral ka ucilung mi mnniqan dxral daw wada ngalan mtnpusu pwakyaw bakuciku ka Rutangcng: Macau pantaw ka pusu na balay Macau, tunarac daya na tikuh dxral u msqapah lmutuc Cyokoku, Tangcay mi Ruhwan pa ida balay psnakan ddha ritaw han, hiti u alaw hriyan dxral daw wada mniqan dxral Rutangcng da. Ti-ri Sing-ceng cyu-hwa Macau pa spuda Teynskyo 'Tangcyu' ka singcngcyu tanwey, knkingal tangcyu u spuda nniqan hiya mniqan bay hhangan na pnrhulan dmuwi hangan, tangcyu u uka hwajn tiwey. Macau saya pa niqan 7 tangcyu, kcka u wamniq Macau pataw ka 5, wa mniq ritaw ka 2. Wa mniq iyax Tangcay mi Ruhwan hnriyan dxral ucilung ka nniqan dxral hiya pa ini psnaki ana kingal tangcyu kiya. Wa mniq iyax Tangcay mi Ruhwan hnriyan dxral ucilung ka nniqan dxral hiya pa ini psnaki ana kingal tangcyu kiya. Kiya mi, 'Tangcyu' singcngcyuhwa pa uxay balay bay singcng ciko cyeyncu, uka hnyuwan na mniq horicu. Kndusan kddiyax sediq Macau u spuda nniqan hiya pnhyuwan ssapah, tukubeycu smnluwan ssapah, dduwi dxral, pnsuwan nniqan sediq mi balay mndungus nniqan lnlingay muda psanak mku cyu Macau. Cing-ci Mrama balay ka keyjay Macau, kngkawas 2015 jnrey hwacan cusu u o.905, bnkuwan knkana mtqiri qnlangan u tu17. Mndungus bay syakay huri tisi ka Macau, kiya ka knkana cyangcu mi cuyeyn muway pila u mnsupu syakay pawcang cicin, 15 kngkawas ini buway pila muyas, mmuyas mi rdrudan u niqan Kongri pqita narux ciko ini ngali pila pqita narux, rdrudan u malu mangal pila bbuway rdrudan pneyyah seyhu. Macau tikuh bay bbuway kocing ninpu pa: Tikuh bay u 1 jikang 30 yeyng (Pila Macau, mntna ka hunac), tikuh bay 1 diyax kocing u 240 yeyng, tikuh balay kocing 1 idas u 6,240 yeyng. Alaw kngkawas 2004 ini biyaw knrana niya ka keyjay Macau, pusu na balay u pneyyah qqpahun pwocay mpriwaw, binaw wada dmudul qqpahun mpsalu sapah, qqpahun huwu, qqpahun uuqun mi qqpahun pawsyeyn u wada mrana hari uri. Quri so scuqi sntama murux bay qpahun Macau pa so bay so slhbnun balay; quri so mpqpah sediq u uka ka mpqpah ka saya uri han, kiya ka duma so sediq ini ttuku pyasan u rinji mniq kcka yurecang; kingal uri u alaw ini biyaw knrana ka keyjay kiya ka wada mkala briyan kana ka qqiya uri da, kngkawas niyi u prading niqan ka pbbari wangcyu wuyey, kiya mi hbaraw ka Kang cucan kongsu, kojyo pcpingan qridin, bbriyan u wada mthdiq bay miyah phiyu kojyo mi cida qqpahun dha, seyhu Macau mniq kngkawas 2005 pkbaraw tocu sediq tnhdilan sinsey cuke daw, ana so wada mlih 70% ka tocu sediq tnhdilan sinsey, binaw wana malu mdakar tikuh cawhong. Kngkawas 2008, nicisisu u wada stabuy mn20 kngkawas truma bay sucu 0.37, wada ini sthiyaq balay ka sediq knou bay pila mi sediq tikuh hari pila, kiya ka mn20 kngkawas u mn5 sediq mnniq hiya smiling nngalan dha pa, knmalu bay ntxal pnsuwan mi pstnaun ka nniqan balay pila mi tikuh hari pila sediq. Kngkawas cnduray niyi nngalan mnniq hiya sediq knkingal idas u wada mrana da, 4000 yeyng mi ini ttuku hbangan niyi u wada mlih quri cuxal uri da. Pkla sediq mnniq hiya pa mquri ccka mssli, ririh sa wada mrana ka nngalan hbangan. Kcka na hiya u, duma sediq alaw tumal pwocayyey kiya ka mkala ka nngalan pila, kiya ka mndungus bay qnepah seyhu mtrawah pwocayyey mi psuwan kana sediq dungal ka sntkuwan pila. Ini stkuhi qmita ka kngkawas niyi seyhu u snpusal muda psasu pila sntkuwan, kiya ka knkana pkbaraw tikuh bay weysng cusu, pila sbuway snbeyhing rudan, unhuway pila, nmalan pila qmpah, mumal muway pila ppanan rulu, mumal muway pila deyngki, pspuwan smpu kana nngalan pila mi snliqan pila uri. Kngkawas 2019 idas 4 diyax 16, tongcicyu u pkla tmiyu 'Macau cini sisu hmrinas kngkawas 2014 o.38 mkala 0.4', spuda pnsdhuwan kari Ryeynhekwo pa o.4 ka seyng tnqlhangan.' Kngkawas 2019 idas 6 diyax 27 , tongcicyu u pkla knhbrawan hiyi sediq mpqpah kndadax qnhangan icil pa dhuq 179,416 hiyi sediq. Pdkanun ka sediq knhbrawan hiyi Macau mi mpqpah sediq kndadax qnlangan icil pa 1:3, knhbaraw bay tumal ka mpqpah sediq kndadax qnhlangan icil pa wada pkmlih bay mpqpah sediq Macau. Tndxral sediq Macau u mqriqu balay sndiyal qpahun. Pocayyey, Ryuyoyey, Ryokang mi Syosyeynyey Macau ka kcka tndxral Cyoka jnmin konghekwo murux bay nniqan dxral alang srwanan seyhu phiyu pwakyaw bakuciku. Ida balay pusu stmanan ngengalan pila ka pwocayyey mi qqpahan rmiwaw. Mniq kngkawas 2014, pwocayyey (kiya ka knkana pwocay congcyeyyey) pnkrana nngalan ka knkana picong u 59.1%. Kngkawas 2016, knkana maw nngalan pwocayyey pa dhuq 2241.28 oku pila Macau, kiya mi nngalan jeyjing pwocayyey u dhuq 843.75 oku pila Macau, kiya ka knkana nngalan hbangan keyjay seyhu (1024.12 oku pila Macau) na 82.4%. Quri rrmiwaw, pusu kcka Macau cyu ssanan rmiwaw u niqan kngkawas 1992 speyyah 8 qnpringan pnswau m8 sdhmaun Macau mi kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 15 wada ngalan Mtqiri qnlangan bungka yican mingru na Macau rikisi cngcyu. Uxay wana pwocayyey, seyhu Macau pa wada knpriyux cyuyu ryoko ka hnyuwan dha uri mi kaygi canran congsin mi Hwan Cusancyaw pkrana kwangcya hwanwey congsyaw ciyey huwu congsin. Ringsoyey, Cinjongyey, Sangyey Pkrana sangyey Macau u ida dndulan balay quri qqpahun rmiwaw, prading ptrawah ka biyax malu pwakyaw nanaq daw, wada kasi ini biyaw mrana ka keyjay Macau, dmudul biyax sediq tnualang hiya mi biyax smliq pila sediq mpriwaw, kiya ka wada knllu bay tnbyaxan na mrana ka keyjay sangyey Macau. Knrana quri mpriwaw Macau u mquri tucyasu syawsyeyn yure, so kiya knrana mniq quri sangyey u wada mangal snbliqan uri, sangyey mniq dndulan mpriwaw pwocayyey u ida qulung mplutuc mpkrana. Macau mniq putting hiti kngkawas 1999 wada muda rianhwa tyawri, kiya mi wada sbliqan ini ngali jeyking, dmayaw ticanyey, pmlih uka qpahun ryu mi pkrana inhang cinjongyey. Seyhu Macau pa dkuhan seyhu Peycing, mbiyax bay sntama tukubeycu knmalu na Macau u wada pdungus hakaw msupu cingmaw hecwo ka Cyokoku mi Portugal. Kongyey Kongyey Macau u bsiyaq bay rikisi niya, tna mniq 300 kngkawas brah cida, nniqan bayhhangan ka cupawyey mi qpahun smmalu asu teymaku Macau. Kngkkawas kcka 1950, syawkweymo cyaw na koba kucu gomu, koba liwas, koba teybukuro, koba syawwucin u skkingal pcriyu kana. Puting hiti kngkawas 1950 dhuq pnrdingan kngkawas 1960, hbaraw balay qqiya kongyey sbari dha dhuq Tongnanya mi thiyaq bay Oco mi Amirika mi knkingal qnlhangan, ptura mtutuy ka syeyntay kongyey Macau. Kngkkawas 1970, wada ini biyaw knnrana niya ka kongyey Macau, qpahun mpsalu lukus mi mawcncuyey u ini biyaw mrana. Mquri nganguc mawyi, spuda patas cingcicyu: Knkana kngkawas 2005 cuko hwocu u 198.2 oku pila Macau, psdkanun kngkawas 2004 u wada mlih 12.1%, cuko canpin u hwangcu, llukus ka pusu, cuko hwocu wada mlih 15.1% dhuq 180.7 oku pila Macau, knkana balay cuko hwocu 77%, uxay hwangcu cuko u ddiyun kikay mi ringcyeyn mi kkucu ka pusu; kiya mi cinko u wada mkala 12.3%, dhuq 313.4 oku pila Macau, mawyi nica u 115.2 oku pila Macau. Ceng-c Lnlingay nniqan seyji Macau u mslxan balay, niqan pnluban niya quri lntudan Portugal na pnwaya piri taypyawcu ka Macau. Pnwaya piri taypyawcu smruwa Rihwahuy spuda knkingal tuy tumal seyngkyo mnangal hyo piri muda keytey khnu knhbrawan hiyi ka gying, dmuwi hantihwa, so kiya pa pusu hnyuwan dmudul cucng cning (Cyeyncupay) mi hantay cning (Mincupay) u to bay niqan rmirih hnang dha kana. Kndadax 12.3 jikeyng daw, cyeyncupay ka dmudul Macau cngtan dhuq saya. Sing-ceng Spuda "Macau Lxan Waya", Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu sngcng cikwan ka seyhu Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu sngcng cangkwan, diyax iyax qpahun u 5 kngkawas, mnou bay lmutuc mn1. Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu singcng cangkwan trahuc na u niqan 5 ka su, psnakan Singcng hwawus, cingci keyjaysu, pawansu, syakay bungkasu, yunsu kongwus, trahuc dungan ka cyu, ting, cu (cu, ke). Singcnghuy u pnsliyan seyhu pusu bukung, rihwahuy gying mi syakay jnsu, dmayaw singcng cangkwan smdhu ddaun. Phiyug Waya Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu rihwa ciko ka Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu rihwahuy, saya u niqan 33 hiyi gying, 14 hiyi ka msdurux seyngkyo pnhiyu, 12 hiyi ka cyeyncye seyngkyo pnhiyu, niqan 7 hiyi ka spuda singcng cangkwan pnsdhu, mntxan qpahun diyax iyax u 4 kngkawas. Mnuda seyngkyo cnduray hari u kngkawas 2017 idas 9 diyax 17 (qtayi ka kngkawas 2017 Macau rihwahuy seyngkyo). Qulung mnniq Macau hmrinas 7 kngkawas mi mttuku 18 kngkawas ka sediq mnniq Macau pa malu kasisdurux seyngkyo, kiya mi mnuda cuce na pnsliyan 'hwajn sweynmin' u malu tumal rihwahuy cyeyncyey seyngkyo mi umau Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu singcng cangkwan tweysweyn weyyeyn. Su-hwa Macau u dmuwi Taruhwa (Oruhwasi). Pnwaya dha waya pa pusu balay u muru waya Portugal, duma pnwaya waya u niqan ka tnuru dha France mi Germany uri. Uxay wana "Lhayan Waya" uri, ddiyun waya u niqan 5 beyhing hwatyeyn, kiya ka : Minhwa tyeyn, Sing hwatyeyn, Sang hwatyeyn, Minsu susong hwatyeyn, Uyey tngci hwatyeyn, Kongcng hwatyeyn u ddiyun balay waya hwatyeyn uri. Kiya u, "Lhayan Waya" sdan 3 pnrngawan, mniq Macau dmuwi pnwaya knkana qnlhangan. Ida niqan nanaq pnwaya, pnrngawan waya, singcng hwakuy mi duma patas pnrngawan uuda dha, qulung so ini psturung "Lhayan Waya" u, ida lmutuc niqan biyax niya. "Lhayan Waya" pnwaya, Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu u mangal dukuricu na shwacweyn mi congsncweyn. Hoeyng u wana thiyi waya, ini dduli ana manu. Shwa cikwan u psnakan 2 cida pnspuwan niya: Hoeyng mi Keyngsaeyng. Hoeyng ka 3 weyn cyeyncu, kiya ka psnakan: Tu1sn Hoeyng Cuci Hoeyng Singcng Hoeyng Congci Hoeyng Cngsn Hoeyng (Tubaraw balay cikwan pswau) Macau u uka pcahu hhuqil, uka ucitusing, kiya mi niqan snpngan diyax pnchuwan u dhuq 25 kngkawas ka qnbsyaqan balay, tukubeycu niya u 30 kngkawas. Pila Pila Macau (splawa dha pupi) ka pila pnway seyhu Macau tecyu, ddiyun pila u uxay wana pila Macau, alaw Kang Aw ddha kluwan pila mniq Macau u psdkanan ida ya bay 103 pila Macau priyux 100 pila Hong Kong, so kiya malu ddiyun uri ka pila Hong Kong uri; mntna bay pila Singapore mi pila Brunei u so kiya uri, ddha pila niyi u malu ppwaluk (binaw ini pntna niya pa, Singapore mi Brunei na pila ddha qnlhangan u malu psriyux dmuwi pila dha kana; kiya u pila Hong Kong mi pila Macau u ana so malu mniq Macau knhmuc dmuwi, binaw mniq Hong Kong daw naqah dmuwi pila Macau). Mniq Macau u, pila Hong Kong u uxay wana malu mniq quri so sangyey tangpu ngalun pila Macau dmuwi, malu ddiyun mniq pwakyaw bakuciku Macau uri. Pila Hong Kong mniq Macau nniqan pwakyaw dduwi pila Kangpi u nuqu hmrinas pila Macau. Ddaun Quri Nganguc Spuda "Macau Lhayan Waya", Cyoka Jnmin Konghekwo Congyang Jnmin Seyhu (Kwowuweyn) psdhu biyax Macau tukubeycu singcngcyu nanaq ka muda uuda mquri nganguc. Macau u malu mniq quri keyjay, mawyi, cinjong, hangyun, tongsyun, rmiwaw, bungka, tiyu spuda hangan 'Cyokoku Macau' (kari Portugal: Macau, China), murux nanaq tuhuy qnlangan knkingal qnhlangan, knkingal nniqan mi quri pnluban pnsliyan kwoci kndhu mi pkrana, psdhu mi muru pnrngawan pstuq kari. Kiya mi mnquri seyji na ddaun waycyaw, kiya u seyhu Peycing kana ka seykining. Wun-hwa Kndadax Macau prading dhuq saya, alaw tukubeycu quri rikisi mi mndungus balay qtan jnwen, singcng mniq Hwanan, Cyokoku, kiya ka kana nniqan Tongya to bay uxay hari qntan na tukubeycu bungka. 400 kngkawas niyi u sediq knkingal alang Oco u pssli mniq Macau, quri so mmahun uqun, mpsalu sapah, kari Macau u to bay mlengu bay tese Portugal kana. Mniq alang cbiyaw cyu Macau mkksa u malu qmita tesec Macau, tonghwang cyeyncu mi sihwang cyeyncu u wana tuayus 1 cyey 1 syang, mksipaw balay nanaq, congsu byo na brah dxral u spawan elu Pusu stmuwan, Nan O su cyeyncu lingan kcka quri damac kwangtong, qtan balay ana inu mniq Macau. Kiya mi mniq kcka knbbaraw bay rikisi Hwa Yang msupu u, mniq Macau u mtuting damac tndxral Portugal, kari tndxral Portugal pnkla tongsi wenming johe. Bungka Yican Alaw Macau mniq cintay Cyokoku tuhuy qnlhangan icil pplawa u niqan balay hniwan niya, niqan mndungus bay bungka yican. Kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 15 cida, 22 ka cyeyncu mi 8 ka beyhing nganguc, dxral brah wada ngalan "Qnlangan bungka yican mingru" ka Macau rikisi cngcyu. Kiya uri u, mndungus bay tese mi dungus rikisi na cyeyncuwu u wada ngalan mniq kcka "Macau wenwu mingru" uri. Macau ryokocyu mi bungka cyu u mnkngkawas 2006 ka "2006 Macau qnlangan yican kngkawas", kiya mi msupu tuhuy muda kou bungka mi cusyaw hwotong, spuda niyi hmuc knkingal alang sediq mpriwaw. Smsung mi diyax sngayan Macau pa 1 kngkawas sngayan kongcong u niqan 20 diyax, kcka knkana diyax smsung Cyokoku, smsung Bukyo mi Teyskyo, kcka u diyax sngayan smsung Teynskyo u to bay mnuru pnwaya Aw Pu seyhu, mray so Sngmu uka qnquwan noda canri mi smsung kndamac lmngelung. Diyax smsung pnsltudan Cyokoku u mniq kngkkawas 1980 wada muda rihwa srwanan. Ini brinas musa Cyokoku han pa, Diyax Pukwo, Diyax Cyameysu mi Diyax Pucyaw, kiya mi Cyoka Minkoku Kwocing ( Smsung dha 10) u mndiyax sngayan kana sediq uri han, binaw babaw brinah Cyokoku daw Cyoka Jnmin Konghekwo diyax smsung pnhyuwan qnhlangan mi 'Diyax smsung p;nhyuwan riju' ka rmirih da. Saya, singcng cangkwan mniq duma diyax tukubeycu uxay daw mniq brah diyax smsung ka muda smruwa ana ini qpah kana, mray so babaw cka hidaw na brah cusi. Jen-ko Knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi pnsanak nniqan Spuda bnatas patas pnklaun Macau tongci mi pucacyu, dhuq kngkawas 2018 idas 6 puting hiti, ya bay niqan 658,900 hiyi sediq ka mnniq Macau, kcka na hiya pa Hwajn ka pusu bay, kiya ka knkana 94% knhbrawan hiyi, sediq Portugal (knkana mniq Macau tndxral mniq hiya ka sediq Portugal) mi sediq qnlhangan icil u 6%. Kcka hiya u sediq icil moqpah niya u niqan 181,499 hiyi, pusu kcka hini u kndadax neyti Cyokoku, bukuy daw Philippines, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Indonesia; sediq Vietnam mi Indonesia pa pusu bay u miyah qmpah qulu sapah mi quri qqpahun muriq niya. Kari mi Ji Seyhu Macau saya pa dmuwi ji Cyokoku mi ji Portugal ka ddiyun seyhu saya. Quri so kari pa, kari Yey ka srngaw balay kndusan kddiyax sediq tndxral Macau; kiya mi kari Eygo ka ddiyun balay quri snbbari qpiya mi qpahun mi ddiyun duma sapah pyasan kiya ka srngaw bay mniq Macau uri. Quri so ji pa, syakay Macau u dmuwi hwanti Congwen, kiya mi tndxral sediq Portugal u ji Portugal ka pusu bay ddiyun. Cung-cyaw Alaw pnspuwan HwaYang ka mniq Macau, sndhu mtrawah snhiyan, snhiyan u knou balay. Alaw knhbrawan balay ka sediq Hwajn, snhiyan dha u niqan Ju, Su, Taw mi thmuku teykung ka pusu balay. Hwajn Macau u dlulan balay bungka Cyoka Minjoku Pnsltudan Bungka mi Jucya na tawte ssyang. Quri snhiyan Kiristo, Teynskyo Macau Cyawcyu u mniq kngkawas 1576 idas 1 diyax 23 pnhiyu, mwaya bay cucyaw ka Cyanayraw (sediq pnhiyu Jncutang). Tu1 Hwajn cucyaw ka Rin cya cyun cucyaw. Alaw brah mbrinah cida knhbaraw bay tndxral sediq Portugal ka thdil mlatac Macau, kiya daw sediq Hwajn ka pusu balay sinjya saya. Kiristo burah kyokay uri ka mptmay Cyokoku na tu1 ratuc dha, Ingkoku London Deydokay na Deyndosi Marisyun u mniq kngkawas 1807 dhuq Macau, prading rmawah ndanan Kiristo Burah Pnrhulan umarang kari Utux Tmninun Utux Baraw mniq Cyokoku. Niqan 2 knrudan bay Pnrhulan Burah Kiristokyo Hwajn ka Macau, kiya ka Cyoka Kiristo Pnrhulan Cutawtang mi Pnrhulan Macau Cinsin, to bay hmrinas 100 kngkawas rikisi kana. Sngkonghuy Weytoriya Cyawcyu u pnhiyu kngkawas 1849, qmlahang knkana Macau, cyawcyu kiya u wada mHong Kong Sngkonghuy Macau Cwantaw Ticyu. Kngkkawas 1970, prading mrana mniq Macau uri ka Pnrhulan tnualang. Kiya u, niqan ini pntna snhiyan uri ka Macau. Mray so Isrankyo u ya bay mniq Mingtay brah cida spuda snbbari sediq Posu umarang kari mtmay Macau, pnsliyan dha u Macau Isran Huy. Pahayi kyo mniq kcka sweyncyaw undo u uwau Macau ngalan dha ssanan de uri, mniq kngkawas 1935 snpeyyah Amirika Cyaco ka Pahayi sinjya Hwaransisu Sira taytay ka rnhak snhiyan niyi mtmay Macau, pnsliyan niyi saya ka Macau Pahayi Congringtihuy, kiya u pusu bay nniqan mquri neyti Cyokoku umarang kari. Ttgsa Seykining Pyasan Tuknbaraw Kyoiku seyhu Macau ka Kawtng Cyawyu Cyu. Macau sayau niqan 12 Kawtng Cyawyu Ciko: Kongri Macau Pyasan Tubeyhing, Macau Pyasan Rikong Sweyweyn, Ryoko Sweyweyn, Macau Pawan Butay Pyasan Tuknbaraw, mi suri Macau Pyasan Keci Tubeyhing, Macau Alang Mkbrnux Pyasan Tubeyhing, Sngjwose Pyasan Tubeyhing, Macau Cinghu Huri Sweyweyn, Macau Kwanri Sweyweyn, Congsi Cwangsin Sweyweyn, kiya mi Macau Oco Keyngkyo Sweyhuy mi UN Pyasan Tubeyhing Kwoci Jwanti Cisu Keyngkyoso. Tu1 syeyntay kawtng weynsyaw ka 'Tong Ya Pyasan Tubeyhing', pnhiyu kngkawas 1981, sslhayan dha muyas kcka hiya pa, kiya ka so niqan balay tese u niqan qmlahang pocay, tiyu mi pskbiyax hiyi, iyu congyi mi snbarah kari. Kngkawas 2013 idas 7 diyax 20 prading, seyhu Macau Tecyu u mndungus bay mangal biyax qqlahang wa mniq Hngcin ka burah nniqan Macau Pyasan Tubeyhing, quri so singcng, ruhwa, suhwa pa mniq Macau u niqan biyax dha qmlahang kana.

= Macao = Gaga kska Yacow ka Macao, 22 10 N, 113 33 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 28.2 sq km(hangan na o Tg237) (knlbanga dxgal o 28.2 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 597,425 hiyi. jiyax 20 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Macao ga wada sogan 0% ka dxgal qpahan, 0% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 100% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Fernando Choi Sai On, pnaah hngkawas2009 idas 12 jiyax 20pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Macao = Macao, splawa Aw, cbiyaw o splawa Hawcingaw, splawa Hawcyang, Rongyamn, Haycing, Macyaw, Sotapo, kiya ka Cyoka jnmin konghekwo ddha tokobeyco singcngcyo ori, wa mniq todaya mkngaho ocilong Nahay, kiya mi siyaw toiwil Cocyangko, lmotoc Cohayso Kwangtong sng ka todaya, tonarc pa msdalih Hong Kong 63 km, tohonac mi toiwil o lmotoc Nanhay. Macao o kiya ka pnspowan Awmn pantaw, Tangcay, Rotang mi Rohwan s4 nniqan, babaw kngkawas 2000 daw iyax Tangcay mi Rohwan o hriyan dxral ka ocilong mi mnniqan dxral daw wada ngalan mtnposo pwakyaw bakociko ka Rotangcng: Macao pantaw ka poso na balay Macao, tonarac daya na tikoh dxral o msqapah lmotoc Cyokoko, Tangcay mi Rohwan pa ida balay psnakan ddha ritaw han, hiti o alaw hriyan dxral daw wada mniqan dxral Rotangcng da. Ti-ri Sing-ceng cyo-hwa Macao pa spoda Teynskyo 'Tangcyo' ka singcngcyo tanwey, knkingal tangcyo o spoda nniqan hiya mniqan bay hhangan na pnrholan dmowi hangan, tangcyo o oka hwajn tiwey. Macao saya pa niqan 7 tangcyo, kcka o wamniq Macao pataw ka 5, wa mniq ritaw ka 2. Wa mniq iyax Tangcay mi Rohwan hnriyan dxral ocilong ka nniqan dxral hiya pa ini psnaki ana kingal tangcyo kiya. Wa mniq iyax Tangcay mi Rohwan hnriyan dxral ocilong ka nniqan dxral hiya pa ini psnaki ana kingal tangcyo kiya. Kiya mi, 'Tangcyo' singcngcyohwa pa oxay balay bay singcng ciko cyeynco, oka hnyowan na mniq horico. Kndosan kddiyax sediq Macao o spoda nniqan hiya pnhyowan ssapah, tokobeyco smnlowan ssapah, ddowi dxral, pnsowan nniqan sediq mi balay mndongos nniqan lnlingay moda psanak mko cyo Macao. Cing-ci Mrama balay ka keyjay Macao, kngkawas 2015 jnrey hwacan coso o o.905, bnkowan knkana mtqiri qnlangan o to17. Mndongos bay syakay hori tisi ka Macao, kiya ka knkana cyangco mi coyeyn moway pila o mnsopo syakay pawcang cicin, 15 kngkawas ini boway pila moyas, mmoyas mi rdrodan o niqan Kongri pqita narox ciko ini ngali pila pqita narox, rdrodan o malo mangal pila bboway rdrodan pneyyah seyho. Macao tikoh bay bboway kocing ninpo pa: Tikoh bay o 1 jikang 30 yeyng (Pila Macao, mntna ka honac), tikoh bay 1 diyax kocing o 240 yeyng, tikoh balay kocing 1 idas o 6,240 yeyng. Alaw kngkawas 2004 ini biyaw knrana niya ka keyjay Macao, poso na balay o pneyyah qqpahon pwocay mpriwaw, binaw wada dmodol qqpahon mpsalo sapah, qqpahon howo, qqpahon ooqon mi qqpahon pawsyeyn o wada mrana hari ori. Qori so scoqi sntama morox bay qpahon Macao pa so bay so slhbnon balay; qori so mpqpah sediq o oka ka mpqpah ka saya ori han, kiya ka doma so sediq ini ttoko pyasan o rinji mniq kcka yorecang; kingal ori o alaw ini biyaw knrana ka keyjay kiya ka wada mkala briyan kana ka qqiya ori da, kngkawas niyi o prading niqan ka pbbari wangcyo woyey, kiya mi hbaraw ka Kang cocan kongso, kojyo pcpingan qridin, bbriyan o wada mthdiq bay miyah phiyo kojyo mi cida qqpahon dha, seyho Macao mniq kngkawas 2005 pkbaraw toco sediq tnhdilan sinsey coke daw, ana so wada mlih 70% ka toco sediq tnhdilan sinsey, binaw wana malo mdakar tikoh cawhong. Kngkawas 2008, nicisiso o wada staboy mn20 kngkawas troma bay soco 0.37, wada ini sthiyaq balay ka sediq knoo bay pila mi sediq tikoh hari pila, kiya ka mn20 kngkawas o mn5 sediq mnniq hiya smiling nngalan dha pa, knmalo bay ntxal pnsowan mi pstnaon ka nniqan balay pila mi tikoh hari pila sediq. Kngkawas cndoray niyi nngalan mnniq hiya sediq knkingal idas o wada mrana da, 4000 yeyng mi ini ttoko hbangan niyi o wada mlih qori coxal ori da. Pkla sediq mnniq hiya pa mqori ccka mssli, ririh sa wada mrana ka nngalan hbangan. Kcka na hiya o, doma sediq alaw tomal pwocayyey kiya ka mkala ka nngalan pila, kiya ka mndongos bay qnepah seyho mtrawah pwocayyey mi psowan kana sediq dongal ka sntkowan pila. Ini stkohi qmita ka kngkawas niyi seyho o snposal moda psaso pila sntkowan, kiya ka knkana pkbaraw tikoh bay weysng coso, pila sboway snbeyhing rodan, onhoway pila, nmalan pila qmpah, momal moway pila ppanan rolo, momal moway pila deyngki, pspowan smpo kana nngalan pila mi snliqan pila ori. Kngkawas 2019 idas 4 diyax 16, tongcicyo o pkla tmiyo 'Macao cini siso hmrinas kngkawas 2014 o.38 mkala 0.4', spoda pnsdhowan kari Ryeynhekwo pa o.4 ka seyng tnqlhangan.' Kngkawas 2019 idas 6 diyax 27 , tongcicyo o pkla knhbrawan hiyi sediq mpqpah kndadax qnhangan icil pa dhoq 179,416 hiyi sediq. Pdkanon ka sediq knhbrawan hiyi Macao mi mpqpah sediq kndadax qnlangan icil pa 1:3, knhbaraw bay tomal ka mpqpah sediq kndadax qnhlangan icil pa wada pkmlih bay mpqpah sediq Macao. Tndxral sediq Macao o mqriqo balay sndiyal qpahon. Pocayyey, Ryoyoyey, Ryokang mi Syosyeynyey Macao ka kcka tndxral Cyoka jnmin konghekwo morox bay nniqan dxral alang srwanan seyho phiyo pwakyaw bakociko. Ida balay poso stmanan ngengalan pila ka pwocayyey mi qqpahan rmiwaw. Mniq kngkawas 2014, pwocayyey (kiya ka knkana pwocay congcyeyyey) pnkrana nngalan ka knkana picong o 59.1%. Kngkawas 2016, knkana maw nngalan pwocayyey pa dhoq 2241.28 oko pila Macao, kiya mi nngalan jeyjing pwocayyey o dhoq 843.75 oko pila Macao, kiya ka knkana nngalan hbangan keyjay seyho (1024.12 oko pila Macao) na 82.4%. Qori rrmiwaw, poso kcka Macao cyo ssanan rmiwaw o niqan kngkawas 1992 speyyah 8 qnpringan pnswao m8 sdhmaon Macao mi kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 15 wada ngalan Mtqiri qnlangan bongka yican mingro na Macao rikisi cngcyo. Uxay wana pwocayyey, seyho Macao pa wada knpriyox cyoyo ryoko ka hnyowan dha ori mi kaygi canran congsin mi Hwan Cosancyaw pkrana kwangcya hwanwey congsyaw ciyey howo congsin. Ringsoyey, Cinjongyey, Sangyey Pkrana sangyey Macao o ida dndolan balay qori qqpahon rmiwaw, prading ptrawah ka biyax malo pwakyaw nanaq daw, wada kasi ini biyaw mrana ka keyjay Macao, dmodol biyax sediq tnoalang hiya mi biyax smliq pila sediq mpriwaw, kiya ka wada knllo bay tnbyaxan na mrana ka keyjay sangyey Macao. Knrana qori mpriwaw Macao o mqori tocyaso syawsyeyn yore, so kiya knrana mniq qori sangyey o wada mangal snbliqan ori, sangyey mniq dndolan mpriwaw pwocayyey o ida qolong mplotoc mpkrana. Macao mniq potting hiti kngkawas 1999 wada moda rianhwa tyawri, kiya mi wada sbliqan ini ngali jeyking, dmayaw ticanyey, pmlih oka qpahon ryo mi pkrana inhang cinjongyey. Seyho Macao pa dkohan seyho Peycing, mbiyax bay sntama tokobeyco knmalo na Macao o wada pdongos hakaw msopo cingmaw hecwo ka Cyokoko mi Portogal. Kongyey Kongyey Macao o bsiyaq bay rikisi niya, tna mniq 300 kngkawas brah cida, nniqan bayhhangan ka copawyey mi qpahon smmalo aso teymako Macao. Kngkkawas kcka 1950, syawkweymo cyaw na koba koco gomo, koba liwas, koba teybokoro, koba syawwocin o skkingal pcriyo kana. Poting hiti kngkawas 1950 dhoq pnrdingan kngkawas 1960, hbaraw balay qqiya kongyey sbari dha dhoq Tongnanya mi thiyaq bay Oco mi Amirika mi knkingal qnlhangan, ptora mtotoy ka syeyntay kongyey Macao. Kngkkawas 1970, wada ini biyaw knnrana niya ka kongyey Macao, qpahon mpsalo lokos mi mawcncoyey o ini biyaw mrana. Mqori ngangoc mawyi, spoda patas cingcicyo: Knkana kngkawas 2005 coko hwoco o 198.2 oko pila Macao, psdkanon kngkawas 2004 o wada mlih 12.1%, coko canpin o hwangco, llokos ka poso, coko hwoco wada mlih 15.1% dhoq 180.7 oko pila Macao, knkana balay coko hwoco 77%, oxay hwangco coko o ddiyon kikay mi ringcyeyn mi kkoco ka poso; kiya mi cinko o wada mkala 12.3%, dhoq 313.4 oko pila Macao, mawyi nica o 115.2 oko pila Macao. Ceng-c Lnlingay nniqan seyji Macao o mslxan balay, niqan pnloban niya qori lntodan Portogal na pnwaya piri taypyawco ka Macao. Pnwaya piri taypyawco smrowa Rihwahoy spoda knkingal toy tomal seyngkyo mnangal hyo piri moda keytey khno knhbrawan hiyi ka gying, dmowi hantihwa, so kiya pa poso hnyowan dmodol cocng cning (Cyeyncopay) mi hantay cning (Mincopay) o to bay niqan rmirih hnang dha kana. Kndadax 12.3 jikeyng daw, cyeyncopay ka dmodol Macao cngtan dhoq saya. Sing-ceng Spoda "Macao Lxan Waya", Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo sngcng cikwan ka seyho Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo sngcng cangkwan, diyax iyax qpahon o 5 kngkawas, mnoo bay lmotoc mn1. Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo singcng cangkwan trahoc na o niqan 5 ka so, psnakan Singcng hwawos, cingci keyjayso, pawanso, syakay bongkaso, yonso kongwos, trahoc dongan ka cyo, ting, co (co, ke). Singcnghoy o pnsliyan seyho poso bokong, rihwahoy gying mi syakay jnso, dmayaw singcng cangkwan smdho ddaon. Phiyog Waya Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo rihwa ciko ka Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo rihwahoy, saya o niqan 33 hiyi gying, 14 hiyi ka msdorox seyngkyo pnhiyo, 12 hiyi ka cyeyncye seyngkyo pnhiyo, niqan 7 hiyi ka spoda singcng cangkwan pnsdho, mntxan qpahon diyax iyax o 4 kngkawas. Mnoda seyngkyo cndoray hari o kngkawas 2017 idas 9 diyax 17 (qtayi ka kngkawas 2017 Macao rihwahoy seyngkyo). Qolong mnniq Macao hmrinas 7 kngkawas mi mttoko 18 kngkawas ka sediq mnniq Macao pa malo kasisdorox seyngkyo, kiya mi mnoda coce na pnsliyan 'hwajn sweynmin' o malo tomal rihwahoy cyeyncyey seyngkyo mi omao Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo singcng cangkwan tweysweyn weyyeyn. So-hwa Macao o dmowi Tarohwa (Orohwasi). Pnwaya dha waya pa poso balay o moro waya Portogal, doma pnwaya waya o niqan ka tnoro dha France mi Germany ori. Uxay wana "Lhayan Waya" ori, ddiyon waya o niqan 5 beyhing hwatyeyn, kiya ka : Minhwa tyeyn, Sing hwatyeyn, Sang hwatyeyn, Minso sosong hwatyeyn, Uyey tngci hwatyeyn, Kongcng hwatyeyn o ddiyon balay waya hwatyeyn ori. Kiya o, "Lhayan Waya" sdan 3 pnrngawan, mniq Macao dmowi pnwaya knkana qnlhangan. Ida niqan nanaq pnwaya, pnrngawan waya, singcng hwakoy mi doma patas pnrngawan ooda dha, qolong so ini pstorong "Lhayan Waya" o, ida lmotoc niqan biyax niya. "Lhayan Waya" pnwaya, Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo o mangal dokorico na shwacweyn mi congsncweyn. Hoeyng o wana thiyi waya, ini ddoli ana mano. Shwa cikwan o psnakan 2 cida pnspowan niya: Hoeyng mi Keyngsaeyng. Hoeyng ka 3 weyn cyeynco, kiya ka psnakan: To1sn Hoeyng Coci Hoeyng Singcng Hoeyng Congci Hoeyng Cngsn Hoeyng (Tobaraw balay cikwan pswao) Macao o oka pcaho hhoqil, oka ocitosing, kiya mi niqan snpngan diyax pnchowan o dhoq 25 kngkawas ka qnbsyaqan balay, tokobeyco niya o 30 kngkawas. Pila Pila Macao (splawa dha popi) ka pila pnway seyho Macao tecyo, ddiyon pila o oxay wana pila Macao, alaw Kang Aw ddha klowan pila mniq Macao o psdkanan ida ya bay 103 pila Macao priyox 100 pila Hong Kong, so kiya malo ddiyon ori ka pila Hong Kong ori; mntna bay pila Singapore mi pila Bronei o so kiya ori, ddha pila niyi o malo ppwalok (binaw ini pntna niya pa, Singapore mi Bronei na pila ddha qnlhangan o malo psriyox dmowi pila dha kana; kiya o pila Hong Kong mi pila Macao o ana so malo mniq Macao knhmoc dmowi, binaw mniq Hong Kong daw naqah dmowi pila Macao). Mniq Macao o, pila Hong Kong o oxay wana malo mniq qori so sangyey tangpo ngalon pila Macao dmowi, malo ddiyon mniq pwakyaw bakociko Macao ori. Pila Hong Kong mniq Macao nniqan pwakyaw ddowi pila Kangpi o noqo hmrinas pila Macao. Ddaon Qori Ngangoc Spoda "Macao Lhayan Waya", Cyoka Jnmin Konghekwo Congyang Jnmin Seyho (Kwowoweyn) psdho biyax Macao tokobeyco singcngcyo nanaq ka moda ooda mqori ngangoc. Macao o malo mniq qori keyjay, mawyi, cinjong, hangyon, tongsyon, rmiwaw, bongka, tiyo spoda hangan 'Cyokoko Macao' (kari Portogal: Macao, China), morox nanaq tohoy qnlangan knkingal qnhlangan, knkingal nniqan mi qori pnloban pnsliyan kwoci kndho mi pkrana, psdho mi moro pnrngawan pstoq kari. Kiya mi mnqori seyji na ddaon waycyaw, kiya o seyho Peycing kana ka seykining. Won-hwa Kndadax Macao prading dhoq saya, alaw tokobeyco qori rikisi mi mndongos balay qtan jnwen, singcng mniq Hwanan, Cyokoko, kiya ka kana nniqan Tongya to bay oxay hari qntan na tokobeyco bongka. 400 kngkawas niyi o sediq knkingal alang Oco o pssli mniq Macao, qori so mmahon oqon, mpsalo sapah, kari Macao o to bay mlengo bay tese Portogal kana. Mniq alang cbiyaw cyo Macao mkksa o malo qmita tesec Macao, tonghwang cyeynco mi sihwang cyeynco o wana toayos 1 cyey 1 syang, mksipaw balay nanaq, congso byo na brah dxral o spawan elo Poso stmowan, Nan O so cyeynco lingan kcka qori damac kwangtong, qtan balay ana ino mniq Macao. Kiya mi mniq kcka knbbaraw bay rikisi Hwa Yang msopo o, mniq Macao o mtoting damac tndxral Portogal, kari tndxral Portogal pnkla tongsi wenming johe. Bongka Yican Alaw Macao mniq cintay Cyokoko tohoy qnlhangan icil pplawa o niqan balay hniwan niya, niqan mndongos bay bongka yican. Kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 15 cida, 22 ka cyeynco mi 8 ka beyhing ngangoc, dxral brah wada ngalan "Qnlangan bongka yican mingro" ka Macao rikisi cngcyo. Kiya ori o, mndongos bay tese mi dongos rikisi na cyeyncowo o wada ngalan mniq kcka "Macao wenwo mingro" ori. Macao ryokocyo mi bongka cyo o mnkngkawas 2006 ka "2006 Macao qnlangan yican kngkawas", kiya mi msopo tohoy moda koo bongka mi cosyaw hwotong, spoda niyi hmoc knkingal alang sediq mpriwaw. Smsong mi diyax sngayan Macao pa 1 kngkawas sngayan kongcong o niqan 20 diyax, kcka knkana diyax smsong Cyokoko, smsong Bokyo mi Teyskyo, kcka o diyax sngayan smsong Teynskyo o to bay mnoro pnwaya Aw Po seyho, mray so Sngmo oka qnqowan noda canri mi smsong kndamac lmngelong. Diyax smsong pnsltodan Cyokoko o mniq kngkkawas 1980 wada moda rihwa srwanan. Ini brinas mosa Cyokoko han pa, Diyax Pokwo, Diyax Cyameyso mi Diyax Pocyaw, kiya mi Cyoka Minkoko Kwocing ( Smsong dha 10) o mndiyax sngayan kana sediq ori han, binaw babaw brinah Cyokoko daw Cyoka Jnmin Konghekwo diyax smsong pnhyowan qnhlangan mi 'Diyax smsong p;nhyowan rijo' ka rmirih da. Saya, singcng cangkwan mniq doma diyax tokobeyco oxay daw mniq brah diyax smsong ka moda smrowa ana ini qpah kana, mray so babaw cka hidaw na brah cosi. Jen-ko Knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi pnsanak nniqan Spoda bnatas patas pnklaon Macao tongci mi pocacyo, dhoq kngkawas 2018 idas 6 poting hiti, ya bay niqan 658,900 hiyi sediq ka mnniq Macao, kcka na hiya pa Hwajn ka poso bay, kiya ka knkana 94% knhbrawan hiyi, sediq Portogal (knkana mniq Macao tndxral mniq hiya ka sediq Portogal) mi sediq qnlhangan icil o 6%. Kcka hiya o sediq icil moqpah niya o niqan 181,499 hiyi, poso kcka hini o kndadax neyti Cyokoko, bokoy daw Philippines, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Indonesia; sediq Vietnam mi Indonesia pa poso bay o miyah qmpah qolo sapah mi qori qqpahon moriq niya. Kari mi Ji Seyho Macao saya pa dmowi ji Cyokoko mi ji Portogal ka ddiyon seyho saya. Qori so kari pa, kari Yey ka srngaw balay kndosan kddiyax sediq tndxral Macao; kiya mi kari Eygo ka ddiyon balay qori snbbari qpiya mi qpahon mi ddiyon doma sapah pyasan kiya ka srngaw bay mniq Macao ori. Qori so ji pa, syakay Macao o dmowi hwanti Congwen, kiya mi tndxral sediq Portogal o ji Portogal ka poso bay ddiyon. Cong-cyaw Alaw pnspowan HwaYang ka mniq Macao, sndho mtrawah snhiyan, snhiyan o knoo balay. Alaw knhbrawan balay ka sediq Hwajn, snhiyan dha o niqan Jo, So, Taw mi thmoko teykong ka poso balay. Hwajn Macao o dlolan balay bongka Cyoka Minjoko Pnsltodan Bongka mi Jocya na tawte ssyang. Qori snhiyan Kiristo, Teynskyo Macao Cyawcyo o mniq kngkawas 1576 idas 1 diyax 23 pnhiyo, mwaya bay cocyaw ka Cyanayraw (sediq pnhiyo Jncotang). To1 Hwajn cocyaw ka Rin cya cyon cocyaw. Alaw brah mbrinah cida knhbaraw bay tndxral sediq Portogal ka thdil mlatac Macao, kiya daw sediq Hwajn ka poso balay sinjya saya. Kiristo borah kyokay ori ka mptmay Cyokoko na to1 ratoc dha, Ingkoko London Deydokay na Deyndosi Marisyon o mniq kngkawas 1807 dhoq Macao, prading rmawah ndanan Kiristo Borah Pnrholan omarang kari Utox Tmninon Utox Baraw mniq Cyokoko. Niqan 2 knrodan bay Pnrholan Borah Kiristokyo Hwajn ka Macao, kiya ka Cyoka Kiristo Pnrholan Cotawtang mi Pnrholan Macao Cinsin, to bay hmrinas 100 kngkawas rikisi kana. Sngkonghoy Weytoriya Cyawcyo o pnhiyo kngkawas 1849, qmlahang knkana Macao, cyawcyo kiya o wada mHong Kong Sngkonghoy Macao Cwantaw Ticyo. Kngkkawas 1970, prading mrana mniq Macao ori ka Pnrholan tnoalang. Kiya o, niqan ini pntna snhiyan ori ka Macao. Mray so Isrankyo o ya bay mniq Mingtay brah cida spoda snbbari sediq Poso omarang kari mtmay Macao, pnsliyan dha o Macao Isran Hoy. Pahayi kyo mniq kcka sweyncyaw ondo o owao Macao ngalan dha ssanan de ori, mniq kngkawas 1935 snpeyyah Amirika Cyaco ka Pahayi sinjya Hwaransiso Sira taytay ka rnhak snhiyan niyi mtmay Macao, pnsliyan niyi saya ka Macao Pahayi Congringtihoy, kiya o poso bay nniqan mqori neyti Cyokoko omarang kari. Ttgsa Seykining Pyasan Toknbaraw Kyoiko seyho Macao ka Kawtng Cyawyo Cyo. Macao sayao niqan 12 Kawtng Cyawyo Ciko: Kongri Macao Pyasan Tobeyhing, Macao Pyasan Rikong Sweyweyn, Ryoko Sweyweyn, Macao Pawan Botay Pyasan Toknbaraw, mi sori Macao Pyasan Keci Tobeyhing, Macao Alang Mkbrnox Pyasan Tobeyhing, Sngjwose Pyasan Tobeyhing, Macao Cingho Hori Sweyweyn, Macao Kwanri Sweyweyn, Congsi Cwangsin Sweyweyn, kiya mi Macao Oco Keyngkyo Sweyhoy mi UN Pyasan Tobeyhing Kwoci Jwanti Ciso Keyngkyoso. To1 syeyntay kawtng weynsyaw ka 'Tong Ya Pyasan Tobeyhing', pnhiyo kngkawas 1981, sslhayan dha moyas kcka hiya pa, kiya ka so niqan balay tese o niqan qmlahang pocay, tiyo mi pskbiyax hiyi, iyo congyi mi snbarah kari. Kngkawas 2013 idas 7 diyax 20 prading, seyho Macao Tecyo o mndongos bay mangal biyax qqlahang wa mniq Hngcin ka borah nniqan Macao Pyasan Tobeyhing, qori so singcng, rohwa, sohwa pa mniq Macao o niqan biyax dha qmlahang kana.
